content.new: In the expanded right column, it's hard to tell where one section ends and the next begins. Perhaps make each section collapsible so that you can see just one section at a time on the right. And/or, make the indentation more dramatic.
content.old: In the expanded right column, it's hard to tell where one section ends and the next begins. Perhaps make each section collapsible so that you can see just one section at a time on the right. And/or, make the indentation more dramatic.

issue.title: Indentation might not be indented enough

message.raw: I just did a bunch of indentation work, and this issue hasn't moved in a while.
message.html: I just did a bunch of indentation work, and this issue hasn't moved in a while.
